segmentosSRT.text: Master Fugui is going home. You take him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: I am very sorry, but you've got nothing left.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
What could you stake the bet on?
We don't accept empty bets.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: The wounded who froze to death.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: And we've painted Chairman Mao's portrait.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: Thanks, we'll go to the factory bathhouse.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
I just came from the hospital.
The doctor says it's due in autumn.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: They held a public trial against him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: Do as Mommy says and push.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
This is the same Wang Bin
who once insulted...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
me and my wife,
saying she wasn't fit to reproduce.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: to educate him, to criticize him...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: and to let him witness her giving birth.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
To show him the heirs
of this new, Red world.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: I was putting on a show.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
- How is he?
- They're both fine!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: You two get the car, we'll be fine.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17
